personal_statement_what_to_improve: The Secondary programme is a demanding course and so requires significant academic aptitude. Your application does not show sufficient accuracy or fluency in written English to meet the standard required for teaching
quality_of_application_what_to_improve: You would benefit from spending more time in secondary school to understand how schools operate
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: The Secondary programme is a demanding course and so requires particular dispositions. Your application does not provide sufficient evidence of your ability to reflect upon your prior experiences in relation to secondary education. You have not demonstrated sufficient evidence of your capacity to develop as a secondary teacher.
